;Labour's recovery in Scotland was even more stunning than its gains south of the border. ;;C;;ONFUSED AND; incoherent, Joe Biden's performance in the first presidential debate on June 27th was ;excruciating; for his supporters.但争论结束后，磨难并没有结束。几分钟后，吉尔·拜登帮助拖着脚步走下舞台的吉尔·拜登试图让事情变得更好，但结果却让事情变得更糟。 “你做得太棒了！” she yelled at the dazed 81-year-old, before a crowd and ;TV; cameras. “You answered every question!”

;

;;B;; oth are ;big-budget sagas about the ruthless pursuit of power.两者都结合了精美的制作价值和巨大的受欢迎程度。 ;“House of the Dragon”; is the third-most “in-demand” television series in the world, according to Parrot Analytics, a data firm. （尽管其前作《权力的游戏》已于 2019 年结束，但《权力的游戏》仍位居榜首。）与此同时，《幕府将军》位列前 0.2%。观看这些节目的数以千万计的人无疑包括从华盛顿到华沙的大量政客。这就提出了一个有趣的问题：他们能学到一些东西吗？ And if so, which of the swords-and-scheming blockbusters offers a better guide to seeking power in real life?

;At first glance, the answer is obvious. 《权力的游戏》的世界是一个奇幻的世界。 Humans in Westeros ride dragons through the clouds at several hundred miles an hour, a feat that would be impossible even if dragons existed, which they don't.敌人不是通过辩论或投票箱消灭的，而是通过魔法阴影、魔法伪装和魔法矿物来消灭的。有时他们会从死里复活。有时龙会从死里复活，成为僵尸龙。 None of these options is available to a politician in the real world.

;“Shogun”, by contrast, is loosely based on actual events. An English ship's navigator, William Adams, really did wash up in Japan in 1600, and he really was ennobled for helping the Shogun, Tokugawa Ieyasu, build a stronger navy. The television series, like the novel by James Clavell on which it is based, changes the names: Adams becomes John Blackthorne (played by Cosmo Jarvis) and Tokugawa becomes Lord Toranaga (Sanada Hiroyuki).; ;It also exaggerates the Englishman's role in the warlord's rise to power. But as historical dramas go, it is fairly true to life. An Englishman in 17th-century Japan would certainly have been astonished by the locals' elaborate courtesy, superior personal hygiene and impromptu beheadings.
